body:
Well yup, the editing took ages on this. I was up all night .-.
I know it is quite a long video, so maybe just fast forward through some parts so you might be able to see and hopefully appreciate some of the time I put into editing. My favorite part would be at 2:55 on the video. The violin and bow weren't downloaded I made the actions on that :D

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hIvQneYtBeo&feature=youtu.be
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hIvQneYtBeo&feature=youtu.be
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hIvQneYtBeo&feature=youtu.be
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hIvQneYtBeo&feature=youtu.be
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hIvQneYtBeo&feature=youtu.be


Hope you enjoy!

replies.body: Nice but i think it could be more hd :)

I liked it!

but what screen recorder did you use? It started to get a little orange looking at about 5 seconds into the video
